trans-unit.source: <token>firstref_zumo</token> integrates with Azure Notification Hubs to enable clients to register for push notifications right from the Mobile Services client library.
trans-unit.target: <token>firstref_zumo</token> integrates with Azure Notification Hubs to enable clients to register for push notifications right from the Mobile Services client library.

trans-unit.source: You can set the permissions on the endpoint used for push registrations like any other <token>nextref_zumo</token> resource.
trans-unit.target: You can set the permissions on the endpoint used for push registrations like any other <token>nextref_zumo</token> resource.

trans-unit.source: Use the <ui>Permission</ui> dropdown to set registration permissions in your JavaScript backend mobile service.
trans-unit.target: Use the <ui>Permission</ui> dropdown to set registration permissions in your JavaScript backend mobile service.

trans-unit.source: Permissions in a .NET backend mobile service are set in the WebApiConfig.cs project file.
trans-unit.target: Permissions in a .NET backend mobile service are set in the WebApiConfig.cs project file.

trans-unit.source: You can invoke your own custom business logic when a registration is created or changed.
trans-unit.target: You can invoke your own custom business logic when a registration is created or changed.

trans-unit.source: This business logic might include adding, deleting or validating tags supplied by the client.
trans-unit.target: This business logic might include adding, deleting or validating tags supplied by the client.

trans-unit.source: In a JavaScript backend mobile service, click <ui>Edit Script</ui> to edit the <languageKeyword>register</languageKeyword> callback function.
trans-unit.target: In a JavaScript backend mobile service, click <ui>Edit Script</ui> to edit the <languageKeyword>register</languageKeyword> callback function.

trans-unit.source: This function is passed the <parameterReference>registration</parameterReference> sent by the client, as well as the <parameterReference>registrationContext</parameterReference> of the service.
trans-unit.target: This function is passed the <parameterReference>registration</parameterReference> sent by the client, as well as the <parameterReference>registrationContext</parameterReference> of the service.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>service</languageKeyword> and <languageKeyword>user</languageKeyword> objects are both fields of the <languageKeyword>registrationContext</languageKeyword>.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>service</languageKeyword> and <languageKeyword>user</languageKeyword> objects are both fields of the <languageKeyword>registrationContext</languageKeyword>.

trans-unit.source: The supplied <parameterReference>done</parameterReference> function is called to end the callback.
trans-unit.target: The supplied <parameterReference>done</parameterReference> function is called to end the callback.

trans-unit.source: When you call <languageKeyword>done</languageKeyword> with an <parameterReference>error</parameterReference> parameter or call <languageKeyword>throw</languageKeyword> to raise an exception, the server returns an internal server error (500) and registration fails.
trans-unit.target: When you call <languageKeyword>done</languageKeyword> with an <parameterReference>error</parameterReference> parameter or call <languageKeyword>throw</languageKeyword> to raise an exception, the server returns an internal server error (500) and registration fails.

trans-unit.source: This enables you to validate and reject user-supplied tags.
trans-unit.target: This enables you to validate and reject user-supplied tags.

trans-unit.source: For a .NET backend mobile service, this same registration business logic is defined by implementing the <languageKeyword>INotificationHandler</languageKeyword> interface.
trans-unit.target: For a .NET backend mobile service, this same registration business logic is defined by implementing the <languageKeyword>INotificationHandler</languageKeyword> interface.

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to use the registration endpoint, see <externalLink><linkText>Send push notifications to authenticated users</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=403384</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For an example of how to use the registration endpoint, see <externalLink><linkText>Send push notifications to authenticated users</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=403384</linkUri></externalLink>.
